title: I need help!
body:
SO the new icon of Zaun is finally here.Well I went to the page of Zaun and  checked my religion and language so I clicked on it.Later I opened my Lol and I couldn;t find the icon ;-; Please if I did somthing wrong please tell me I really want that icon.{I went at the end of the page{Free icon} and I clicked}
{{champion:19}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Per the [Zaun ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/piltover#zaun-champion-tales)page, icons will be continued to be granted by the 16th.  You may not see it right away until then, but in the meantime you can scroll down that page to make sure it says "Success!"  Let me know if that clears things up!
It doesn't say "success" anywhere...What should I do now ? ;-;

When you navigate to the [Zaun page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/piltover#zaun-champion-tales), make sure that you are logged into the correct account and region.  You can confirm this by seeing your login details at the top right of the redemption page.  Let me know if that helps.

So yeah I understood  sir{Thanks for the help btw} It still doesn't say success anywhere but I hope in a few days I will get it:) The thing is that I am worried because I really do not want  the "event" to end and not having the icon >.<{{champion:254}}  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
